mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_jsp_board (num,writer,subject,content,ip,filename,filesize,show) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from project_jsp_board) , #{writer},#{subject} , #{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize},#{show})
INSERT INTO project_jsp_comment (c_num,board_num,c_writer,c_content) VALUES ((select nvl(max(c_num)+1,1) from project_jsp_comment) , #{board_num}, #{c_writer}, #{c_content})
mapper.update: UPDATE project_jsp_board SET down=down+1 WHERE num=#{num}
UPDATE project_jsp_board SET readcount=readcount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
